results.name: Smallest prime factor of 6*n-1.
xref: Cf. A107744, smallest prime factor of 6*n+1); A107746, values of n such that A107744(n) > A107745(n); A107747, values of n such that A107744(n) < A107745(n).
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, May 23 2005
